title: Junior Miss Comics
additional-notes: A note in the 1972 CCE Periodicals volume says to 'consult copyright office' for full issue renewal information.  The renewal for the first issue (which is also the only issue we have found with this title and publisher) was recorded in the July-December 1977 CCE Periodicals volume, and was filed in 1972.

This appears to be distinct from the 'Junior Miss' periodical published by Bilbara around the same time.  We are not sure if the Medallion series that began in 1947 is a successor to this comic or the Bilbara publication.
